casebody.data:
No. 10-174. American Electric Power Company Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Connecticut, et al. 563 U.S. 902, 131 S. Ct. 1807,

179 L. Ed. 2d 652,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2441. March 28, 2011.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for divided argument and enlargement of time for oral argu*653ment granted.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
